TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ToolLocationHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides utility methods for locating [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK files and directories.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, ToolLocationHelper, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
[!code-cs[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ILAsm/ILAsm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/ILAsmVB/ILAsm.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetDisplayNameForTargetFrameworkDirectory (string targetFrameworkDirectory, System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName frameworkName);
.method public static hidebysig string GetDisplayNameForTargetFrameworkDirectory(string targetFrameworkDirectory, class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName frameworkName) cil managed

Docs.param: The target framework directory.
The framework name.
Docs.summary: Creates a display name given the target framework details.
Docs.returns: Returns a display name given the target framework details.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This is the equivalent of the target framework moniker, but for display.
If one cannot be found from the redist list file, a synthesized one is returned, so there is always a display name.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey (Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version);
.method public static hidebysig string GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey(valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version) cil managed

Docs.param: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
Docs.summary: Gets the full name of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] root registry key.
Docs.returns: A string containing the full name of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] root registry key.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetDotNetFrameworkSdkInstallKeyValue (Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version);
.method public static hidebysig string GetDotNetFrameworkSdkInstallKeyValue(valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version) cil managed

Docs.param: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
Docs.summary: Gets the name of the value under the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey%2A> that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK installation path.
Docs.returns: Returns a string containing the name of the registry key value under the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetDotNetFrameworkRootRegistryKey%2A> that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK installation path.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetDotNetFrameworkSdkRootRegistryKey (Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version);
.method public static hidebysig string GetDotNetFrameworkSdkRootRegistryKey(valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version) cil managed

Docs.param: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
Docs.summary: Returns the full name of the .NET Framework SDK root registry key.
Docs.returns: Returns a string representation of the registry key root which indicates where to find the .NETFramework sdk.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetDotNetFrameworkVersionFolderPrefix (Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version);
.method public static hidebysig string GetDotNetFrameworkVersionFolderPrefix(valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version) cil managed

Docs.param: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
Docs.summary: Gets the prefix of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] folder.
Docs.returns: Returns the prefix of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An example of the value returned is the string "v2.0".

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
Docs.summary: Gets a fully qualified path to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] root directory.
Docs.returns: A string containing the fully qualified path to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] root directory, or a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if the targeted version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is not installed.

Docs.param: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
Desired architecture, or DotNetFrameworkArchitecture.Current for the architecture this process is currently running under.
Docs.summary: Gets a fully qualified path to the framework's root directory.
Docs.returns: Returns a fully qualified path to the framework's root directory.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkFile (string fileName, Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: The file to locate in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] directory.
The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
Docs.summary: Gets a fully qualified path to a file in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] directory.
Docs.returns: A string containing the fully qualified path to the specified file, or a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if the targeted version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is not installed.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
[!code-cs[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ILAsm/ILAsm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/ILAsmVB/ILAsm.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkFile (string fileName, Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version, Microsoft.Build.Utilities.DotNetFrameworkArchitecture architecture);

.method public static hidebysig string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkFile(string fileName, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.DotNetFrameworkArchitecture architecture) cil managed

Docs.param: File name to locate in the .NET Framework directory
Version of the targeted .NET Framework
Desired architecture, or DotNetFrameworkArchitecture.Current for the architecture this process is currently running under.
Docs.summary: Gets a fully qualified path to a file in the frameworks root directory for the specified architecture.
Docs.returns: Returns a fully qualified path to a file in the frameworks root directory.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies (Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version);
.method public static hidebysig string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies(valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version) cil managed

Docs.param: Version of the targeted .NET Framework
Docs.summary: Returns the path to the reference assemblies location for the given framework version.
Docs.returns: Returns a string containing the fully qualified path to the Reference Assemblies folder, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the targeted version of the .NET Framework is not installed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkSdk (Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version);
.method public static hidebysig string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkSdk(valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version) cil managed

Docs.param: The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
Docs.summary: Gets the fully qualified path to the \bin directory of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.
Docs.returns: A string containing the fully qualified path to the \bin directory of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK, or a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if the targeted version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK is not installed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkSdkFile (string fileName, Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version);
.method public static hidebysig string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkSdkFile(string fileName, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: The file to locate in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.
The version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to target.
Docs.summary: Gets the fully qualified path to a file in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK.
Docs.returns: A string containing the fully qualified path to the \bin directory of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK, or a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) if the targeted version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] SDK is not installed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The path for the SDK takes in consideration the processor architecture environment information for the calling process, so it might end up being ".../bin/i64", for example.
Unlike <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetPathToDotNetFrameworkFile%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetPathToSystemFile%2A> this method checks for the existence of the file, so that an invalid `fileName` returns null.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkSdkFile (string fileName, Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version, Microsoft.Build.Utilities.DotNetFrameworkArchitecture architecture);

.method public static hidebysig string GetPathToDotNetFrameworkSdkFile(string fileName, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TargetDotNetFrameworkVersion version, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Utilities.DotNetFrameworkArchitecture architecture) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: File name to locate in the .NET Framework SDK directory
Version of the targeted .NET Framework
The required architecture of the requested file.
Docs.summary: Gets a fully qualified path to a file in the .NET Framework SDK.
Docs.returns: Returns a fully qualified path to a file in the .NET Framework SDK. Throws an error if the .NET Framework SDK can't be found.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> GetPathToReferenceAssemblies (System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName frameworkName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> GetPathToReferenceAssemblies(class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName frameworkName) cil managed

Docs.param: The framework name.
Docs.summary: Gets the paths to the reference assemblies location for the given target framework.
Docs.returns: Returns the paths to the reference assemblies location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method assumes that the requested ReferenceAssemblyRoot path will be the ProgramFiles directory that is specified by Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles. In addition, when the .NETFramework or .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers are seen and targetFrameworkVersion is 2.0, 3.0, 3.5, or 4, the correctly chained reference assembly paths for the legacy .NET Framework versions will be returned. This chaining will use the existing GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies to build up the list of reference assembly paths.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> GetPathToReferenceAssemblies (string targetFrameworkRootPath, System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName frameworkName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> GetPathToReferenceAssemblies(string targetFrameworkRootPath, class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName frameworkName) cil managed

Docs.param: Root directory which will be used to calculate the reference assembly path. The references assembies will be generated in the following way TargetFrameworkRootPath\TargetFrameworkIdentifier\TargetFrameworkVersion\SubType\TargetFrameworkSubType.
A frameworkName class which represents a TargetFrameworkMoniker. This cannot be null.
Docs.summary: Gets the paths to the reference assemblies location for the given framework version relative to a given targetFrameworkRoot.
Docs.returns: Returns the paths to the reference assemblies location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method does not check to see if the path exists or not.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> GetPathToReferenceAssemblies (string targetFrameworkIdentifier, string targetFrameworkVersion, string targetFrameworkProfile);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> GetPathToReferenceAssemblies(string targetFrameworkIdentifier, string targetFrameworkVersion, string targetFrameworkProfile) cil managed

Docs.param: Identifier being targeted
Version being targeted
Profile being targeted
Docs.summary: Returns the paths to the reference assemblies location for the given target framework. This method will assume the requested ReferenceAssemblyRoot path will be the ProgramFiles directory specified by Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles In additon when the .NETFramework or .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers are seen and targetFrameworkVersion is 2.0, 3.0, 3.5 or 4.0 we will return the correctly chained reference assembly paths for the legacy .NET Framework versions. This chaining will use the existing GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies to build up the list of reference assembly paths.
Docs.returns: Collection of reference assembly locations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetPathToStandardLibraries (string targetFrameworkIdentifier, string targetFrameworkVersion, string targetFrameworkProfile);
.method public static hidebysig string GetPathToStandardLibraries(string targetFrameworkIdentifier, string targetFrameworkVersion, string targetFrameworkProfile) cil managed

Docs.param: Identifier being targeted
Version being targeted
Profile being targeted
Docs.summary: Returns the path to the reference assemblies location for the given target framework's standard libraries (i.e. mscorlib). This method will assume the requested ReferenceAssemblyRoot path will be the ProgramFiles directory specified by Environment.SpecialFolder.ProgramFiles In additon when the .NETFramework or .NET Framework targetFrameworkIdentifiers are seen and targetFrameworkVersion is 2.0, 3.0, 3.5 or 4.0 we will return the correctly chained reference assembly paths for the legacy .NET Framework versions. This chaining will use the existing GetPathToDotNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies to build up the list of reference assembly paths.
Docs.returns: Collection of reference assembly locations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetPathToSystemFile (string fileName);
.method public static hidebysig string GetPathToSystemFile(string fileName) cil managed

Docs.param: The file to locate in the System folder.
Docs.summary: Gets a fully qualified path to a file in the system directory.
Docs.returns: A string containing the fully qualified path to the the file in the system directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This API builds the full path plus filename for a file in the System folder. It doesn't check for the existence of the file prior to returning.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetProgramFilesReferenceAssemblyRoot ();
.method public static hidebysig string GetProgramFilesReferenceAssemblyRoot() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the root location for the reference assembly directory under the program files directory.
Docs.returns: Returns the root location for the reference assembly directory.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> GetSupportedTargetFrameworks ();
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> GetSupportedTargetFrameworks() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a list of supported target framework monikers.
Docs.returns: list of supported target framework monikers

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName HighestVersionOfTargetFrameworkIdentifier (string targetFrameworkRootDirectory, string frameworkIdentifier);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName HighestVersionOfTargetFrameworkIdentifier(string targetFrameworkRootDirectory, string frameworkIdentifier) cil managed

Docs.param: Target framework root directory.
Framework identifier.
Docs.summary: Gets the highest version of a target framework moniker based on the identifier.
Docs.returns: Returns the highest version of a target framework moniker based on the identifier. This method will only find full frameworks; no profiles will be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string PathToSystem { get; }
.property string PathToSystem

Docs.summary: Gets the fully qualified path of the system directory.
Docs.value: A string containing a directory path to the system directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An example of the value returned is the string "C:\WinNT\System32".
